types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: Float
types.description: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Date
types.description: The `Date` scalar type represents a Date value with Time component. The Date type appears in a JSON response as a String representation compatible with ISO-8601 format.

types.name: URI
types.description: The `URI` scalar type represents a string resource identifier compatible with URI standard. The URI type appears in a JSON response as a String.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

types.name: __Directive
types.description: A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document. In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQLâ€™s execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

types.name: __Type
types.description: The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum. Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema IDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar IDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field argument IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface IDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an union IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field IDL definition.

types.name: Organization
types.description: An organization as seen from the outside

types.name: ChatRoom
types.description: A chat room as viewed from the outside

fields.name: members
fields.description: the members in the chat room

types.name: Guid
types.description: The `Guid` scalar type represents a Globaly Unique Identifier value. It's a 128-bit long byte key, that can be serialized to string.

types.name: ChatMember
types.description: A chat member is an organization member participating in a chat room

fields.name: role
fields.description: the member's role in the chat

types.name: Member
types.description: An organization member

fields.name: chatRoomEvents
fields.description: events related to a specific chat room

args.name: chatRoomId
args.description: the ID of the chat room to listen to events from

types.name: ChatRoomEvent
types.description: Something that happened in the chat room, like a new message sent

fields.name: chatRoomId
fields.description: the ID of the chat room in which the event happened

fields.name: time
fields.description: the time the message was received at the server

types.name: ChatRoomSpecificEvent
types.description: data which is specific to a certain type of event

types.name: NewMessage
types.description: a new public message has been sent in the chat room

fields.name: authorId
fields.description: the member ID of the message's author

fields.name: chatRoomId
fields.description: the ID of the chat room the message belongs to

fields.name: date
fields.description: the time the message was received at the server

types.name: EditedMessage
types.description: a public message of the chat room has been edited

fields.name: authorId
fields.description: the member ID of the message's author

fields.name: chatRoomId
fields.description: the ID of the chat room the message belongs to

fields.name: date
fields.description: the time the message was received at the server

types.name: DeletedMessage
types.description: a public message of the chat room has been deleted

types.name: MemberJoined
types.description: a member has joined the chat

types.name: MemberLeft
types.description: a member has left the chat

args.name: organizationId

args.name: organizationId
args.description: the ID of the organization the chat room and member are in

args.name: organizationId
args.description: the ID of the organization the chat room and member are in

args.name: chatRoomId
args.description: the ID of the chat room

fields.name: enterOrganization

fields.name: leaveChatRoom

args.name: organizationId
args.description: the ID of the organization the chat room and member are in

args.name: chatRoomId
args.description: the ID of the chat room

args.name: organizationId
args.description: the ID of the organization the chat room and member are in

types.name: ChatRoomForMember
types.description: A chat room as viewed by a chat room member

fields.name: meAsAChatMember
fields.description: the chat member that queried the details

fields.name: otherChatMembers

types.description: A chat member is an organization member participating in a chat room

fields.name: privId
fields.description: the member's private ID used for authenticating their requests

fields.name: role
fields.description: the member's role in the chat

types.name: OrganizationForMember

fields.name: meAsAMember
fields.description: the member that queried the details

types.name: MeAsAMember
types.description: An organization member

fields.name: privId
fields.description: the member's private ID used for authenticating their requests

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: defer
directives.description: Defers the resolution of this field or fragment

directives.name: stream
directives.description: Streams the resolution of this field or fragment

directives.name: live
directives.description: Subscribes for live updates of this field or fragment
